segments.text: What do you want to be ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dad , I haven't thought about it . I'm still young .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , honey , but you must know what your hobby is , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you play the piano well . You could be a good pianist . That's good .
segments.speaker: S1
